title: Clubs Problem?
body: I logged into league and realized that the club i created wasnt showing up on my profile, but on friends profiles it shows the club, and says im still the leader. Just wondering if there is a fix or not to make the club reappear on my profile

replies.body: ive had the same issue for a month and a half now, ive reached out to support but it seems the issue only impacts the leaders of the clubs, the riot support person said that we are still in the club but other than that nothin else they can do i guess

We can assist you with resolving this issue if you reach out in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) One of our specialists will reach back out as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
